Server.ServerController

Class ServerCommunication

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.ServerController.ServerCommunication

  • public class ServerCommunication
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates the object instances of the class and connects with client to get and pass the informations requested by the user
    Since:
    April 14, 2020
